summary: A exploration of the fanaticism that surrounds the Apple brand, featuring interviews with Mac evangelists and members of the Mac community.
cast: Shawn King|Galen Brandt|Bruce Damer|Daniel Kottke|Leander Kahney|Guy Kawasaki|Alan Lundell|Tim Holmes|Marian Sun McNamee|Adam C. Engst|Andy Ihnatko|Caesar Lima|Count Michael Eldridge|Deborah Schultz|David Lerner|Violet Blue|Raines Cohen|Ty Shipman|Julian Bennett Holmes|Ilene Hoffman|Delfred Holmes|Joseph O. Holmes|Deborah Shadovitz|Taylor Barcroft|Adam Jackson|Mitch Huitema|Lucian Buscemi|Tonya Savage
title: Macheads
